name: Wafflebaum the Jacabob
description:
This rather dear-hearted little Jacabob enjoys a morning with the paper under the warm glow of a computer monitor, has cravings for cherries and chocolate, and squidgee squeezles.

Wafflebaum stands 2.75 inches tall. He has a cute little mini-button nose and he wears a hot pink star on his chest to remind him of his specialness. A lovely sheep down the road named Bernice donated the bright peacock blue wool for his body. His face however is made of natural white wool from Clara the sheep who bunks with Bernice. Wafflebaum is made by the needle felting method which means poking and poking a lump of wool with a special and very sharp barbed needle while girded with nerves of steel until his form appears. This has made him quite courageous....or daft. There's a fine line there.

He adores woodchucks and plays well with other Jacabobs and Burbles :o)

He's not fond of kitties. Seriously.....really. I mean it. :o)

name: Jacaboo
description:
Loook eento ma eyezzz!

Happy Halloween from a wee Dracubob to you!

Stands 2.85 inches tall made of the darkest grey, nearly black wool from a wayward sheep who has recently shared the barn with Bernice and Evelyn. Like his fellows, he too enjoys the warm blue glow of a computer monitor, jolly romps in the woods at midnight and has cravings for strawberry jam and crumpets.

He's not as scarey as he looks, perfectly harmless really....unless you're a barn kitty. 

Note: Not made for small children. Wings made of paper, wire and paint; somewhat delicate

name: Nudiped and Bunnykins RESERVED for Tim
description:
RESERVED please, for Tim.

In the wood past the end of the garden hedgerows near the deep forest pond live a quorum of Nudipeds. Nudipeds are most often sighted during the sultry evenings of midsummer around dusk or dawn basking on soft mossy clumps of the woodland floor in the filtered light of the faint sun. This little one appears to be heading to bed.

She's 3.5 inches tall and made by the needle felting method, kind of squidgee in the middle. Her Bunnykins is of course much smaller.

Abhors kitties of any kind but plays quite well with others.

*Delicate and not meant for small children.

name: RESERVED for Secret Birthday Man :o)
description:
A very special birthday Ursabob :o)
